name: threadtheory
description: - **Inspired Design**: Based on the elegant React design you shared, adapted to our HTML/CSS/JS structure - **Floating Elements**: Animated background bubbles with gradient colors - **Creator Profiles**: 6 detailed creator profiles with specializations, experience, and featured works - **Interactive Features**:    - Filter creators by specialty (Dresses, Tops, Bottoms, etc.)   - Modal popups with detailed creator information   - Direct WhatsApp contact integration   - Smooth animations and hover effects
